Quote.Author: LL Cool J
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody is perfect, but life is about choices

Quote.Author: LL Cool J
Quote.QuoteValue: I think when you move past your fear and you go after your dreams wholeheartedly, you become free

Quote.Author: LL Cool J
Quote.QuoteValue: I was listening to Jimi Hendrix; I just admire his artistry and creativity as an artist

Quote.Author: LL Cool J
Quote.QuoteValue: Timing has a lot to with art

Quote.Author: LL Cool J
Quote.QuoteValue: I am what I am, I'm doing very well in my life, and I'm thankful to God for that

Quote.Author: LL Cool J
Quote.QuoteValue: I've got to see my movie to see how I'm acting, see what little things I can learn about my craft

Quote.Author: Logan Pearsall Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: It takes a great man to give sound advice tactfully, but a greater to accept it graciously

Quote.Author: Logan Pearsall Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: It is through the cracks in our brains that ecstasy creeps in

Quote.Author: Logan Pearsall Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: People say that life is the thing, but I prefer reading

Quote.Author: Logan Pearsall Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: We need two kinds of acquaintances, one to complain to, while to the others we boast

Quote.Author: Logan Pearsall Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: It is the wretchedness of being rich that you have to live with rich people

Quote.Author: Logan Pearsall Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: The vitality of a new movement in Art must be gauged by the fury it arouses

Quote.Author: Logan Pearsall Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Solvency is entirely a matter of temperament and not of income

Quote.Author: Logan Pearsall Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Our names are labels, plainly printed on the bottled essence of our past behavior

Quote.Author: Logan Pearsall Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness is a wine of the rarest vintage, and seems insipid to a vulgar taste

Quote.Author: Logan Pearsall Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to be thought a liar, always tell the truth

Quote.Author: Loni Love
Quote.QuoteValue: I like having peace and quiet in my life, and I am perfectly happy in my relationships

Quote.Author: Loni Love
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a fear of being broke. That's what I have a fear of. I'm not kidding

Quote.Author: Loni Love
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is funny, and that's why I celebrate it in my shows

Quote.Author: Loni Love
Quote.QuoteValue: I do talk about celebrity relationships like Kim Kardashian's. I like to find the humor in love

Quote.Author: Loni Love
Quote.QuoteValue: That's a nice thing about being a topical standup: you can add in things to keep it fresh

Quote.Author: Loni Love
Quote.QuoteValue: Being in the Girl Scouts took me out of the projects environment and showed me different things

Quote.Author: Loni Love
Quote.QuoteValue: Whatever you're destined to do, you will be

Quote.Author: Loni Love
Quote.QuoteValue: One of my dreams was to change the way women of color were seen on television

Quote.Author: Loni Love
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm fat, and I support fat celebrities, like Oprah

Quote.Author: Loni Love
Quote.QuoteValue: If you are a woman with your own money, you have confidence. You have the pick of the litter

Quote.Author: Lord Acton
Quote.QuoteValue: Power tends to corrupt and absolute power corrupts absolutely

Quote.Author: Lord Acton
Quote.QuoteValue: History is not a burden on the memory but an illumination of the soul

Quote.Author: Lord Acton
Quote.QuoteValue: Learn as much by writing as by reading

Quote.Author: Lord Acton
Quote.QuoteValue: Liberty is not the power of doing what we like, but the right to do what we ought

Quote.Author: Lord Acton
Quote.QuoteValue: To be able to look back upon one's past life with satisfaction is to live twice

Quote.Author: Lord Acton
Quote.QuoteValue: The long term versus the short term argument is one used by losers

Quote.Author: Lord Acton
Quote.QuoteValue: The danger is not that a particular class is unfit to govern: every class is unfit to govern

Quote.Author: Lord Acton
Quote.QuoteValue: Liberty is not a means to a higher political end. It is itself the highest political end

Quote.Author: Lord Acton
Quote.QuoteValue: Save for the wild force of Nature, nothing moves in this world that is not Greek in its origin

Quote.Author: Lord Acton
Quote.QuoteValue: Socialism means slavery

Quote.Author: Loretta Lynch
Quote.QuoteValue: A license to practice law is not a license to violate it

Quote.Author: Loretta Lynch
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a great thing to live in a digital age. It's convenient; it's fast

Quote.Author: Loretta Lynch
Quote.QuoteValue: When suspicion and hostility is allowed to fester, it can erupt into unrest

Quote.Author: Loretta Lynch
Quote.QuoteValue: We don't always choose moments. You know, sometimes they choose us

Quote.Author: Loretta Lynch
Quote.QuoteValue: After all we have been through, blacks and other minorities deserve to be protected, as anyone else

Quote.Author: Loretta Lynch
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that the death penalty is an effective penalty

Quote.Author: Loretta Lynch
Quote.QuoteValue: Michael Grimm never met a tax he didn't lie to evade

Quote.Author: Loretta Lynch
Quote.QuoteValue: Russell Defreitas plotted to commit a terrorist attack that he hoped would rival 9/11

Quote.Author: Loretta Lynch
Quote.QuoteValue: Those who willfully conceal assets overseas undermine the playing field for all taxpayers

Quote.Author: Loretta Lynch
Quote.QuoteValue: I truly love coming to work every day

Quote.Author: Loretta Lynn
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been around a long time, and life still has a whole lot of surprises for me

Quote.Author: Loretta Lynn
Quote.QuoteValue: I loved being outside. We'd hold lightning bugs in our fingers and pretend they were diamond rings

Quote.Author: Loretta Lynn
Quote.QuoteValue: You get used to sadness, growing up in the mountains, I guess

Quote.Author: Loretta Lynn
Quote.QuoteValue: The night I announced I was getting married, Daddy paced for hours on the porch

Quote.Author: Loretta Lynn
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd love to travel to the Holy Land

Quote.Author: Loretta Lynn
Quote.QuoteValue: How do you measure your value?

Quote.Author: Loretta Lynn
Quote.QuoteValue: In the long run, you make your own luck - good, bad, or indifferent

Quote.Author: Loretta Lynn
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't know how babies were made until I was pregnant with my fourth child

Quote.Author: Loretta Lynn
Quote.QuoteValue: When something is bothering me, I write a song that tells my feelings

Quote.Author: Loretta Lynn
Quote.QuoteValue: The country is making a big mistake not teaching kids to cook and raise a garden and build fires

Quote.Author: Loretta Young
Quote.QuoteValue: Wearing the correct dress for any occasion is a matter of good manners

Quote.Author: Loretta Young
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm grateful to God for His bountiful gifts... He gave me courage and faith in myself

Quote.Author: Loretta Young
Quote.QuoteValue: A charming woman... doesn't follow the crowd. She is herself

Quote.Author: Loretta Young
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that prayer is our powerful contact with the greatest force in the universe

Quote.Author: Loretta Young
Quote.QuoteValue: I couldn't bear it if anyone knew I had hardly any self-confidence at all

Quote.Author: Loretta Young
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want a place in the sun, you have to expect a few blisters

Quote.Author: Loretta Young
Quote.QuoteValue: I was deaf and dumb and blind to all but me, myself and I

Quote.Author: Loretta Young
Quote.QuoteValue: Unless some misfortune has made it impossible, everyone can have good posture

Quote.Author: Loretta Young
Quote.QuoteValue: The split second she ceases to care is the only time a woman ceases to be attractive

Quote.Author: Loretta Young
Quote.QuoteValue: Just because you want to be glamorous, don't be a sheep about your eye makeup

Quote.Author: Lou Ferrigno
Quote.QuoteValue: The attitude is very important. Because, your behavior radiates how you feel

Quote.Author: Lou Ferrigno
Quote.QuoteValue: If you are going to try and hide something, sooner or later people are going to find out

Quote.Author: Lou Ferrigno
Quote.QuoteValue: 'The Hulk' was the beginning of me, a platform as an actor to grow

Quote.Author: Lou Ferrigno
Quote.QuoteValue: You are going to have bad days and have good days

Quote.Author: Lou Ferrigno
Quote.QuoteValue: To be a champion you must act like one, act like a champion

Quote.Author: Lou Ferrigno
Quote.QuoteValue: The truth is, I've been the Hulk my whole life

Quote.Author: Lou Ferrigno
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always had an ambition to do 'Dancing with the Stars.'

Quote.Author: Lou Ferrigno
Quote.QuoteValue: I did a movie 'I Love You, Man' and it got great reviews; it was very enjoyable

Quote.Author: Lou Ferrigno
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a tremendous passion for fitness, I love challenges and I am a very driven guy

Quote.Author: Lou Ferrigno
Quote.QuoteValue: I never think about losing

Quote.Author: Lou Reed
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a bit of magic in everything, and some loss to even things out

Quote.Author: Lou Reed
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm an artist and that means I can be as egotistical as I want to be

Quote.Author: Lou Reed
Quote.QuoteValue: When I record an album I'm trying to get as close as possible to that perfect moment

Quote.Author: Lou Reed
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is like Sanskrit read to a pony

Quote.Author: Lou Reed
Quote.QuoteValue: One chord is fine. Two chords are pushing it. Three chords and you're into jazz

Quote.Author: Lou Reed
Quote.QuoteValue: I love Ornette Coleman. I love Don Cherry. I love the way those guys play

Quote.Author: Lou Reed
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that everything happens for a reason, everything happens when it's going to happen

Quote.Author: Lou Reed
Quote.QuoteValue: One of my rules is: Never listen to your old stuff

Quote.Author: Lou Reed
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll tell ya, I'm a genuinely nice guy. I really am. A real nice guy. But I think I'm temperamental

Quote.Author: Lou Reed
Quote.QuoteValue: I think life is far too short to concentrate on your past. I rather look into the future

Quote.Author: Louis Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: Musicians don't retire; they stop when there's no more music in them

Quote.Author: Louis Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: If you have to ask what jazz is, you'll never know

Quote.Author: Louis Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: There is two kinds of music, the good, and the bad. I play the good kind

Quote.Author: Louis Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: We all do 'do, re, mi,' but you have got to find the other notes yourself

Quote.Author: Louis Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: What we play is life

Quote.Author: Louis Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: There are some people that if they don't know, you can't tell them

Quote.Author: Louis Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: All music is folk music. I ain't never heard a horse sing a song

Quote.Author: Louis Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is life itself. What would this world be without good music? No matter what kind it is

Quote.Author: Louis Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: You blows who you is

Quote.Author: Louis Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: The memory of things gone is important to a jazz musician

Quote.Author: Louis D. Brandeis
Quote.QuoteValue: There are no shortcuts in evolution

Quote.Author: Louis D. Brandeis
Quote.QuoteValue: Neutrality is at times a graver sin than belligerence

Quote.Author: Louis D. Brandeis
Quote.QuoteValue: The logic of words should yield to the logic of realities

Quote.Author: Louis D. Brandeis
Quote.QuoteValue: If you would only recognize that life is hard, things would be so much easier for you

Quote.Author: Louis D. Brandeis
Quote.QuoteValue: If we desire respect for the law, we must first make the law respectable

Quote.Author: Louis D. Brandeis
Quote.QuoteValue: The most important political office is that of the private citizen

Quote.Author: Louis D. Brandeis
Quote.QuoteValue: Most of the things worth doing in the world had been declared impossible before they were done

Quote.Author: Louis D. Brandeis
Quote.QuoteValue: If we would guide by the light of reason we must let our minds be bold

Quote.Author: Louis D. Brandeis
Quote.QuoteValue: Behind every argument is someone's ignorance

Quote.Author: Louis D. Brandeis
Quote.QuoteValue: Organisation can never be a substitute for initiative and for judgement

Quote.Author: Louis Farrakhan
Quote.QuoteValue: I loved Elijah Muhammad with a love that I can't adequately describe

Quote.Author: Louis Farrakhan
Quote.QuoteValue: They call them terrorists, I call them freedom fighters

Quote.Author: Louis Farrakhan
Quote.QuoteValue: White people are potential humans - they haven't evolved yet

Quote.Author: Louis Farrakhan
Quote.QuoteValue: I was never named in the early years as having anything to do with the assassination of Malcolm

Quote.Author: Louis Farrakhan
Quote.QuoteValue: I am hoping that in this year of the family we will go into our families and reconcile differences

Quote.Author: Louis Farrakhan
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think about my legacy, if indeed, I have one

Quote.Author: Louis Farrakhan
Quote.QuoteValue: They should regard me as what I am. I am a spiritual leader and teacher

Quote.Author: Louis Farrakhan
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that rather than condemning Islam, Islam needs to be studied by those who are sincere

Quote.Author: Louis Farrakhan
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that ego-driven leaders will be a thing of the past because the masses are tired

Quote.Author: Louis Farrakhan
Quote.QuoteValue: Anarchy may await America, due to the daily injustices suffered by the people

Quote.Author: Louis Kahn
Quote.QuoteValue: Consider the momentous event in architecture when the wall parted and the column became

Quote.Author: Louis Kahn
Quote.QuoteValue: Design is not making beauty, beauty emerges from selection, affinities, integration, love

Quote.Author: Louis Kahn
Quote.QuoteValue: I try to create homes, not houses

Quote.Author: Louis Kahn
Quote.QuoteValue: Architecture is the thoughtful making of space

Quote.Author: Louis Kahn
Quote.QuoteValue: Architecture is the reaching out for the truth

Quote.Author: Louis Kahn
Quote.QuoteValue: What does a house want to be?

Quote.Author: Louis Kahn
Quote.QuoteValue: In a small room one does not say what one would in a large room

Quote.Author: Louis Kahn
Quote.QuoteValue: A room is not a room without natural light

Quote.Author: Louis Kahn
Quote.QuoteValue: Architecture struck me between the eye and the eyeball

Quote.Author: Louis Kahn
Quote.QuoteValue: Every building must have... its own soul

Quote.Author: Louis L'Amour
Quote.QuoteValue: All loose things seem to drift down to the sea, and so did I

Quote.Author: Louis L'Amour
Quote.QuoteValue: A wise man fights to win, but he is twice a fool who has no plan for possible defeat

Quote.Author: Louis L'Amour
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody got anywhere in the world by simply being content

Quote.Author: Louis L'Amour
Quote.QuoteValue: I think of myself... as a troubadour, a village storyteller, the guy in the shadows of the campfire

Quote.Author: Louis L'Amour
Quote.QuoteValue: A good beginning makes a good end

Quote.Author: Louis L'Amour
Quote.QuoteValue: A great book begins with an idea; a great life, with a determination

Quote.Author: Louis L'Amour
Quote.QuoteValue: No one can get an education, for of necessity education is a continuing process

Quote.Author: Louis L'Amour
Quote.QuoteValue: He might never really do what he said, but at least he had it in mind. He had somewhere to go

Quote.Author: Louis L'Amour
Quote.QuoteValue: To disbelieve is easy; to scoff is simple; to have faith is harder

Quote.Author: Louis L'Amour
Quote.QuoteValue: Too often I would hear men boast of the miles covered that day, rarely of what they had seen

Quote.Author: Louis Theroux
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not that comfortable doing polemic or being strident

Quote.Author: Louis Theroux
Quote.QuoteValue: Arguably, there's an emotional side of life that I'm not always completely plugged into

Quote.Author: Louis Theroux
Quote.QuoteValue: I like eating food after it's gone off

Quote.Author: Louis Theroux
Quote.QuoteValue: All religions are, in some basic sense, irrational

Quote.Author: Louis Theroux
Quote.QuoteValue: I am genuinely a bit confused about the world, a little bit bumbling

Quote.Author: Louis Theroux
Quote.QuoteValue: I am genuinely slightly vague and chaotic in my habits. For good or ill, you know

Quote.Author: Louis Theroux
Quote.QuoteValue: The trouble is, I just don't know if I'm too human or not human enough

Quote.Author: Louis Theroux
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of money could be saved if we ate urban wildlife

Quote.Author: Louis Theroux
Quote.QuoteValue: Reflecting the truth sounds easy, but sometimes it's not

Quote.Author: Louis Theroux
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not pugnacious or argumentative. I'd probably feel fear going into a pub in the Outback

Quote.Author: Louis XIV
Quote.QuoteValue: First feelings are always the most natural

Quote.Author: Louis XIV
Quote.QuoteValue: Every time I appoint someone to a vacant position, I make a hundred unhappy and one ungrateful

Quote.Author: Louis XIV
Quote.QuoteValue: It is legal because I wish it

Quote.Author: Louis XIV
Quote.QuoteValue: There is little that can withstand a man who can conquer himself

Quote.Author: Louis XIV
Quote.QuoteValue: Laws are the sovereigns of sovereigns

Quote.Author: Louis XIV
Quote.QuoteValue: It is impossible to please all the world

Quote.Author: Louis XIV
Quote.QuoteValue: I am the state

Quote.Author: Louis XIV
Quote.QuoteValue: Every time I create an appointment, I create a hundred malcontents and one ingrate

Quote.Author: Louis XIV
Quote.QuoteValue: I could sooner reconcile all Europe than two women

Quote.Author: Louis XIV
Quote.QuoteValue: The Pyrenees are no more

Quote.Author: Louisa May Alcott
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not afraid of storms, for I'm learning how to sail my ship

Quote.Author: Louisa May Alcott
Quote.QuoteValue: Happy is the son whose faith in his mother remains unchallenged

Quote.Author: Louisa May Alcott
Quote.QuoteValue: Do the things you know, and you shall learn the truth you need to know

Quote.Author: Louisa May Alcott
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not afraid of storms for I am learning how to sail my ship

Quote.Author: Louisa May Alcott
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is a great beautifier

Quote.Author: Louisa May Alcott
Quote.QuoteValue: Good books, like good friends, are few and chosen; the more select, the more enjoyable

Quote.Author: Louisa May Alcott
Quote.QuoteValue: It takes two flints to make a fire

Quote.Author: Louisa May Alcott
Quote.QuoteValue: Women have been called queens for a long time, but the kingdom given them isn't worth ruling

Quote.Author: Louisa May Alcott
Quote.QuoteValue: Work is and always has been my salvation and I thank the Lord for it

Quote.Author: Louisa May Alcott
Quote.QuoteValue: He who believes is strong; he who doubts is weak. Strong convictions precede great actions

Quote.Author: Luc de Clapiers
Quote.QuoteValue: Great thoughts come from the heart

Quote.Author: Luc de Clapiers
Quote.QuoteValue: The wicked are always surprised to find ability in the good

Quote.Author: Luc de Clapiers
Quote.QuoteValue: Clarity is the counterbalance of profound thoughts

Quote.Author: Luc de Clapiers
Quote.QuoteValue: One promises much, to avoid giving little

Quote.Author: Luc de Clapiers
Quote.QuoteValue: Indolence is the sleep of the mind

Quote.Author: Luc de Clapiers
Quote.QuoteValue: The things we know best are the things we haven't been taught

Quote.Author: Luc de Clapiers
Quote.QuoteValue: Lazy people are always anxious to be doing something

Quote.Author: Luc de Clapiers
Quote.QuoteValue: All grand thoughts come from the heart

Quote.Author: Luc de Clapiers
Quote.QuoteValue: We should expect the best and the worst of mankind, as from the weather

Quote.Author: Luc de Clapiers
Quote.QuoteValue: Patience is the art of hoping

Quote.Author: Lucas Till
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm sure there are some haters out there, but I just put my blinders on

Quote.Author: Lucas Till
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Crush' was my first number one on the call sheet

Quote.Author: Lucas Till
Quote.QuoteValue: It was awesome and liberating to play a Russian spy

Quote.Author: Lucas Till
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate the amount of communication, the obligation that you have just by owning a phone

Quote.Author: Lucas Till
Quote.QuoteValue: Hard work always wins in the end

Quote.Author: Lucas Till
Quote.QuoteValue: All my childhood dreams have come true

Quote.Author: Lucas Till
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really into video games

Quote.Author: Lucas Till
Quote.QuoteValue: I would describe my relationship with my couch as symbiotic - others would describe it as dangerous

Quote.Author: Lucas Till
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Legend of the Drunken Master' was my favorite

Quote.Author: Lucas Till
Quote.QuoteValue: My mom's a chemist, so she's pretty smart

Quote.Author: Lucille Ball
Quote.QuoteValue: The secret of staying young is to live honestly, eat slowly, and lie about your age

Quote.Author: Lucille Ball
Quote.QuoteValue: Once in his life, every man is entitled to fall madly in love with a gorgeous redhead

Quote.Author: Lucille Ball
Quote.QuoteValue: The more things you do, the more you can do

Quote.Author: Lucille Ball
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not funny. What I am is brave

Quote.Author: Lucille Ball
Quote.QuoteValue: In life, all good things come hard, but wisdom is the hardest to come by

Quote.Author: Lucille Ball
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd rather regret the things I've done than regret the things I haven't done

Quote.Author: Lucille Ball
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want something done, ask a busy person to do it. The more things you do, the more you can do

Quote.Author: Lucille Ball
Quote.QuoteValue: I think knowing what you cannot do is more important than knowing what you can

Quote.Author: Lucille Ball
Quote.QuoteValue: You see much more of your children once they leave home

Quote.Author: Lucille Ball
Quote.QuoteValue: Women's Lib? Oh, I'm afraid it doesn't interest me one bit. I've been so liberated it hurts

Quote.Author: Lucretius
Quote.QuoteValue: The drops of rain make a hole in the stone, not by violence, but by oft falling

Quote.Author: Lucretius
Quote.QuoteValue: The fall of dropping water wears away the Stone

Quote.Author: Lucretius
Quote.QuoteValue: What is food to one man is bitter poison to others

Quote.Author: Lucretius
Quote.QuoteValue: Such are the heights of wickedness to which men are driven by religion

Quote.Author: Lucretius
Quote.QuoteValue: It is great wealth to a soul to live frugally with a contented mind

Quote.Author: Lucretius
Quote.QuoteValue: Victory puts us on a level with heaven

Quote.Author: Lucretius
Quote.QuoteValue: In the midst of the fountain of wit there arises something bitter, which stings in the very flowers

Quote.Author: Lucretius
Quote.QuoteValue: So potent was religion in persuading to evil deeds

Quote.Author: Lucretius
Quote.QuoteValue: And life is given to none freehold, but it is leasehold for all

Quote.Author: Lucretius
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is one long struggle in the dark

Quote.Author: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not possible to go forward while looking back

Quote.Author: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe
Quote.QuoteValue: Architecture is the will of an epoch translated into space

Quote.Author: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe
Quote.QuoteValue: Less is more

Quote.Author: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to be interesting. I want to be good

Quote.Author: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe
Quote.QuoteValue: I do not oppose form, but only form as a goal

Quote.Author: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe
Quote.QuoteValue: Architecture starts when you carefully put two bricks together. There it begins

Quote.Author: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe
Quote.QuoteValue: God is in the details

Quote.Author: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe
Quote.QuoteValue: Means must be subsidiary to ends and to our desire for dignity and value

Quote.Author: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe
Quote.QuoteValue: Generally, I think my work has so much influence because of its reasonableness

Quote.Author: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe
Quote.QuoteValue: It is no use working with other architects. What can they do? Who does what?

Quote.Author: Ludwig van Beethoven
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is a higher revelation than all wisdom and philosophy

Quote.Author: Ludwig van Beethoven
Quote.QuoteValue: Music should strike fire from the heart of man, and bring tears from the eyes of woman

Quote.Author: Ludwig van Beethoven
Quote.QuoteValue: Only the pure in heart can make a good soup

Quote.Author: Ludwig van Beethoven
Quote.QuoteValue: I will seize fate by the throat; it shall certainly never wholly overcome me

Quote.Author: Ludwig van Beethoven
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing is more intolerable than to have to admit to yourself your own errors

Quote.Author: Ludwig van Beethoven
Quote.QuoteValue: This is the mark of a really admirable man: steadfastness in the face of trouble

Quote.Author: Ludwig van Beethoven
Quote.QuoteValue: Art! Who comprehends her? With whom can one consult concerning this great goddess?

Quote.Author: Ludwig van Beethoven
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is the mediator between the spiritual and the sensual life

Quote.Author: Ludwig van Beethoven
Quote.QuoteValue: Beethoven can write music, thank God, but he can do nothing else on earth

Quote.Author: Ludwig van Beethoven
Quote.QuoteValue: A great poet is the most precious jewel of a nation

Quote.Author: Ludwig von Mises
Quote.QuoteValue: A lasting order cannot be established by bayonets

Quote.Author: Ludwig von Mises
Quote.QuoteValue: Economically considered, war and revolution are always bad business

Quote.Author: Ludwig von Mises
Quote.QuoteValue: If men do not now succeed in abolishing war, civilization and mankind are doomed

Quote.Author: Ludwig von Mises
Quote.QuoteValue: Society has arisen out of the works of peace; the essence of society is peacemaking

Quote.Author: Ludwig von Mises
Quote.QuoteValue: The attainment of the economic aims of man presupposes peace

Quote.Author: Ludwig von Mises
Quote.QuoteValue: The philosophy of protectionism is a philosophy of war

Quote.Author: Ludwig von Mises
Quote.QuoteValue: The worst evils which mankind has ever had to endure were inflicted by bad governments

Quote.Author: Ludwig von Mises
Quote.QuoteValue: War prosperity is like the prosperity that an earthquake or a plague brings

Quote.Author: Ludwig von Mises
Quote.QuoteValue: War... is harmful, not only to the conquered but to the conqueror

Quote.Author: Ludwig von Mises
Quote.QuoteValue: Whoever wants peace among nations must seek to limit the state and its influence most strictly

Quote.Author: Ludwig Wittgenstein
Quote.QuoteValue: The human body is the best picture of the human soul

Quote.Author: Ludwig Wittgenstein
Quote.QuoteValue: If people never did silly things nothing intelligent would ever get done

Quote.Author: Ludwig Wittgenstein
Quote.QuoteValue: The limits of my language means the limits of my world

Quote.Author: Ludwig Wittgenstein
Quote.QuoteValue: Whereof one cannot speak, thereof one must be silent

Quote.Author: Ludwig Wittgenstein
Quote.QuoteValue: A confession has to be part of your new life

Quote.Author: Ludwig Wittgenstein
Quote.QuoteValue: Knowledge is in the end based on acknowledgement

Quote.Author: Ludwig Wittgenstein
Quote.QuoteValue: Logic takes care of itself; all we have to do is to look and see how it does it

Quote.Author: Ludwig Wittgenstein
Quote.QuoteValue: Our greatest stupidities may be very wise

Quote.Author: Ludwig Wittgenstein
Quote.QuoteValue: A philosopher who is not taking part in discussions is like a boxer who never goes into the ring

Quote.Author: Ludwig Wittgenstein
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know why we are here, but I'm pretty sure that it is not in order to enjoy ourselves

Quote.Author: Lukas Forchhammer
Quote.QuoteValue: It's always more fun when something happens outside of a script

Quote.Author: Lukas Forchhammer
Quote.QuoteValue: It's very satisfying when you see your song at the top of the charts

Quote.Author: Lukas Forchhammer
Quote.QuoteValue: We don't take advantage of our position. We keep saying no to free stuff, as we can afford it now

Quote.Author: Lukas Forchhammer
Quote.QuoteValue: I bought a restaurant - that was pretty expensive
